div.span: Pursuant to San Diego County Public Health Order, all SDUHSD schools and the District Office are closed indefinitely. Further information and resources are available on the district Coronavirus Information webpage. Please check back for updates. We apologize for any inconvenience.

div.div: April 3, 2020, 2:00 p.m. Coronavirus Update #17: District Update - Spring Break, Grading and Resources
April 1, 2020, 5:00 p.m. Coronavirus Update #16: School Closure Update
Previous Coronavirus Updates can be found on the Coronavirus Information webpage.

img.style: width: 100%;max-width: 178px;height: auto;max-height: 146px;border: 2px solid #f2f2f2; float: left; margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px
img.span: The award-winning San Dieguito Union High School District is one of the nation's finest districts, offering a wealth of academic and extracurricular opportunities in which its students can engage and excel. The SDUHSD educates students from the coastal North San Diego County communities of Cardiff-by-the-Sea, Encinitas, Leucadia, and Olivenhain in the City of Encinitas; the cities of Del Mar and Solana Beach; the community of La Costa in the City of Carlsbad; the community of Carmel Valley in the City of San Diego; and the communities of Rancho Santa Fe and Fairbanks Ranch.
